title: Jane Fonda accepts BAFTA while being arrested during climate change protest

Veteran actress Jane Fonda managed to accept a BAFTA while being arrested during her weekly climate change protest in Washington DC.

The 81-year-old was detained for the third time in two weeks after rocking up on the steps of the Capitol building.

It comes after she vowed to protest in the nation's capital “every Friday” for at least 14 weeks.

Jane was awarded the Stanley Kubrick Britannia Award on Friday, but was unable to attend the Los Angeles ceremony as she had been detained.

(Image: ABACA/PA Images)

(Image: Getty Images)

As she was tied up, she announced: “Bafta thank you, thank you for the Stanley Kubrick Britannia Award for Excellence in Film.”

She continued: “Thank you, I'm sorry I'm not there. I'm very honored!”

The clip was played at the BAFTAs and led to resounding cheers from many attendees.

The iconic star was awarded the honour as she was being arrested for the third time in a fortnight while protesting against climate change in the US capital.

Photos from the protest and her subsequent detention show the actress dressed in a long red coat, black trousers and black shoes, with her hands restricted with zip-tie handcuffs.

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: ABACA/PA Images)

Jane was also seen raising her tied hands up, in what could be seen as a gesture of triumph.

She was joined at the protest by actor Ted Danson, who was also restrained with zip tie handcuffs.

The 71-year-old actor was pictured laughing as he attended the protest in a grey flat cap, a grey sweater, a grey jacket and blue jeans.

According to Capitol police, the two stars were “among 32 people arrested for allegedly unlawfully demonstrating in the intersection of East Capitol and First Streets”.

The demonstrators have been charged with a range of misdemeanours including crowding, obstructing or incommoding.

Jane is expected to protest in Washington DC for the coming Fridays, until January when she has to return to her Netflix show Grace and Frankie.
